languages.text: "Что это было?" {n}За вашим плечом возникает Хейнрикс.{/n} "Вы додумались кинуть что-то в реактор? Я бы на вашем месте воздержался от подобных экспериментов".

traits.locale_text: "Что это было?" {n}За вашим плечом возникает Хейнрикс.{/n} "Вы додумались кинуть что-то в реактор? Я бы на вашем месте воздержался от подобных экспериментов".

languages.text: "What was that?" {n}Heinrix appears behind you.{/n} "Did you think it a good idea to throw something into the reactor? I'd refrain from such experiments if I were you."
languages.original_text: "Что это было?" {n}За вашим плечом возникает Хейнрикс.{/n} "Вы додумались кинуть что-то в реактор? Я бы на вашем месте воздержался от подобных экспериментов".

traits.locale_text: "What was that?" {n}Heinrix appears behind your shoulder.{/n} "Did you find it a good idea to throw something into the reactor? I'd refrain from such experiments if I were you."
"What was that?" {n}Heinrix appears behind your shoulder.{/n} "Did you find it a good idea to throw something into the reactor? I'd refrain from such experiments if I were you."
"What was that?" {n}Heinrix appears behind your shoulder.{/n} "Did you find it a good idea to throw something into the reactor? I'd refrain from such experiments if I were you."
"What was that?" {n}Heinrix appears behind your shoulder.{/n} "Did you find it a good idea to throw something into the reactor? I'd refrain from such experiments if I were you."
"What was that?" {n}Heinrix appears behind you.{/n} "Did you think it a good idea to throw something into the reactor? I'd refrain from such experiments if I were you."
"What was that?" {n}Heinrix appears behind you.{/n} "Did you think it a good idea to throw something into the reactor? I'd refrain from such experiments if I were you."

languages.text: "Was war das?" {n}Heinrix taucht hinter dir auf.{/n} "Habt Ihr es für einen guten Einfall gehalten, etwas in den Reaktor zu werfen? Ihr solltet von solchen Experimenten lieber absehen."
languages.original_text: "What was that?" {n}Heinrix appears behind you.{/n} "Did you think it a good idea to throw something into the reactor? I'd refrain from such experiments if I were you."

traits.locale_text: "Was war das?" {n}Heinrix taucht hinter deiner Schulter auf.{/n} "Habt Ihr es für einen guten Einfall gehalten, etwas in den Reaktor zu werfen? Ihr solltet von solchen Experimenten lieber absehen."

languages.text: « Qu'est-ce que c'était que ça ? {n}demande Heinrix en apparaissant derrière vous.{/n} Ça vous semble une bonne idée, de jeter des choses dans un réacteur ? À votre place, j'éviterais ce genre d'expériences... »
languages.original_text: "What was that?" {n}Heinrix appears behind you.{/n} "Did you think it a good idea to throw something into the reactor? I'd refrain from such experiments if I were you."

traits.locale_text: « Qu'est-ce que c'était que ça ? » {n}Heinrix apparaît par-dessus votre épaule.{/n} « Ça vous semble une bonne idée, de jeter des choses dans un réacteur ? À votre place, j'éviterais ce genre d'expériences... »

languages.text: “刚刚那是什么？”{n}海因里希出现在你身后。{/n}“你觉得往反应堆里扔东西是个好主意吗？如果我是你的话，我可不会做那样的实验。”
languages.original_text: "What was that?" {n}Heinrix appears behind you.{/n} "Did you think it a good idea to throw something into the reactor? I'd refrain from such experiments if I were you."

traits.locale_text: “刚刚那是什么？”{n}海因里希出现在你身后。{/n}“你觉得往反应堆里扔东西是个好主意吗？如果我是你的话，我可不会做那样的实验。”

languages.text: 「それは何ですか？」{n}ハインリックスが背後から現れる。{/n}「リフレクターに何かを投げ込むのが名案だとお思いですか？我であれば、そんな実験はいたしませんが」
languages.original_text: "What was that?" {n}Heinrix appears behind you.{/n} "Did you think it a good idea to throw something into the reactor? I'd refrain from such experiments if I were you."

traits.locale_text: 「何だそれは？」{n}ハインリックスが背後から現れる。{/n}「リフレクターに何かを投げ込むのが名案だとでも？俺があなただったら、そんな実験はしない」

languages.text: «¿Qué era eso?» {n}Heinrix aparece detrás de ti.{/n} «¿Le ha parecido buena idea arrojar algo al reactor? En su lugar me abstendría de tales experimentos».
languages.original_text: "What was that?" {n}Heinrix appears behind you.{/n} "Did you think it a good idea to throw something into the reactor? I'd refrain from such experiments if I were you."

traits.locale_text: «¿Qué era eso?» {n}Heinrix aparece detrás de ti.{/n} «¿Te ha parecido buena idea arrojar algo al reactor? En su lugar me abstendría de tales experimentos».

languages.text: "Bu neydi şimdi?" {n}Heinrix arkanda bitiveriyor.{/n} "Sana, reaktöre bir şey atmanın iyi bir fikir olduğunu düşündüren nedir? Yerinde olsam deneysel yaklaşımlardan kaçınırdım."
languages.original_text: "What was that?" {n}Heinrix appears behind you.{/n} "Did you think it a good idea to throw something into the reactor? I'd refrain from such experiments if I were you."

traits.locale_text: "O da neydi?" {n}Heinrix arkanda bitiveriyor.{/n} "Sana, reaktöre bir şey fırlatmanın iyi bir fikir olduğunu düşündüren nedir? Senin yerinde olsam deneysel yaklaşımlardan kaçınırdım."
